event.name: FACTION_TRANSPORT
event.text: This beacon hosts a FACTION transport. It's safe to bet the ship is most likely carrying some special tech. If you can kill its crew, their cargo will be yours.

choice.text: Demand the surrender of their goods.

event.text: You prepare to secure their cargo by force.
They stay outside your weapons range, and eventually jump away.

event.name: TRANSPORT_CAPTURE_FACTION
event.text: The crew is dead, leaving you with the ship. It's cargo is yours for the taking. Aboard is the special tech you expected, which you bring back to your ship.

escape.text: They look like they don't want to fight. They are trying to escape.
